name: Wall-Isle
description:
Wall-Isle WARNING :

It seems godot has some trouble with exporting 3D games in html5. Or maybe it's itch.io. Just wait a one or two minutes when the game starts and when you load your first level, mute the page if you don't like this horrible sound, and don't panic, it should be working fine :) Else you can wait for the windows/mac/linux versions that will come in one or two days or get the godot-project that I uploaded in this page ;) Enjoy!

Default Buttons : Left arrow key,

Right arrow key,
Escape (optional),
You can rress Left and Right to click a button in the UI game or use your mouse

Credits :

Hello and thank you for playing! I hope you liked the game :) All the graphical assets are made by me (Miari le rat or Miari) on Krita and Blender.

Here is the credits for the other things I used:
